Judul: Female astronomers of colour endure bias Two-fifths of those surveyed report feeling unsafe at work.
Abstrak: Women of colour working in astronomy and planetary science experience high rates of harassment at work, a study finds. In a survey, a striking 40% of these scientists reported feeling unsafe in their workplaces owing to their gender, and 28% reported feeling unsafe on account of their race.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Sumber: 266 | NAT U R E | VOL 547 | 20 J U LY 2017
